original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 326.70/80 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 326.70/80 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 326.90/327.00 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.80/95 percent from 13.85/14.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/95 percent from 13.85/14.05 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.05/15 percent from 14.10/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.05/15 percent, from 14.15/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.10/30 percent, from 14.30/40 percent. (Colombo/Dec13/2023)
